content: HELLO! You won a $500 gift card! Claim now! Just reply YES to get your prize!!!
Hello! Thank you for contacting XYZ Home Services. How can I assist you with your plumbing, electrical, or HVAC needs today?
YES! Send your address and card details for gift delivery!
It appears this conversation is not related to home services. If you need assistance with plumbing, electrical, or HVAC issues, please let us know.
reason: Customer sent spam content unrelated to home services.
